title: (x) Extraterrestial Highway sign - Computer {Patricia}
content:
Can anyone identify the typeface used on this sign? I know what you are thinking. I know the font sucks, but I am uncontrollably drawn towards its sheer amount of suck. Thanks in advance.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131022054712im_/http:/typophile.com/files/extraterrestrial.jpg)
author: Chocolate_Mint

comments.content:
It's called, appropriately, Computer

[http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/agfa/computer/](http://web.archive.org/web/20131022054712/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/agfa/computer/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/agfa/computer/")

this is the wrong forum - belongs on Type ID Board.
Sorry about that. It was my first post, I wasn't sure where it should be. Thankyou though.
